about_the_game:
About this game

"City of sky" sky city is a beautiful girl decryption adventure game. Hidden items and room all sorts of strange things, open the brain hole gameplay, annual burning brain games Juxian, high degree of difficulty, challenge your iq.


"City of Sky" is described as a beautiful girl decryption adventure game with a theme set in a sky city. The game features hidden items, mysterious rooms, and brain-teasing gameplay. It is designed to be an annual brain-burning game with a high level of difficulty, aiming to challenge players' IQ. The storyline revolves around a little girl who, after a misfortune during a meteor shower, loses her memory. In her quest to find her lost memories, players explore various locations and embark on an adventure.

Game features

Suitable for players of all ages with a high intelligence quotient.
Minimal plot and hints, emphasizing IQ challenges.
In-game features include item exchange, NPC interaction, article collection, and article synthesis.
Brain-teasing puzzles that require common sense to unlock.
Currently, the game is only available in Chinese, and work is underway to develop an English version and additional functions.
The game starts with nothing, and players need to explore the map scene, collect items, and manage their knapsack.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 9.0

  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
